timeline.bodyText: Enables the HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) header for HTTPS responses and allows a value to be set for that header, for example: "max-age=31536000;includeSubDomains". HSTS can also be configured in the web.xml file by setting the "com.ibm.ws.webcontainer.ADD_STS_HEADER_WEBAPP" context parameter.

+addStrictTransportSecurityHeader.desc=Enables the HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) header for HTTPS responses and allows a value for that header to be set.
